Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bacteriocin TP [N5K; K6W; L7W; G9,13K; G10W; V11W]

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Optimization of Antibacterial Activity in Tibetan Swine α-Helix Peptide TP by Site-Directed Mutagenesis.
Literature.Author: Li G, Yuan X, Chen H, Li B, Shao C, Zhu Y, Lai Z, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=64 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:75% Cytotoxicity=128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:80% Cytotoxicity	=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM)
